description:
Use this resource to create dayu layer 4 rule

~> **NOTE:** This resource only support resource Anti-DDoS of type `bgpip` and `net`

Source.description: Source ip or domain, valid format of ip is like `1.1.1.1` and valid format of host source is like `abc.com`.

Weight.description: Weight of the source, the valid value ranges from 0 to 100.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DPort.description: The destination port of the L4 rule.

HealthCheckHealthNum.description: Health threshold of health check, and the default is 3. If a success result is returned for the health check 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is normal. The value range is 2-10.

HealthCheckInterval.description: Interval time of health check. The value range is 10-60 sec, and the default is 15 sec.

HealthCheckSwitch.description: Indicates whether health check is enabled. The default is `false`. Only valid when source list has more than one source item.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: HTTP Status Code. The default is 26 and value range is 2-60.

HealthCheckUnhealthNum.description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is 3. If the unhealthy result is returned 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is abnormal. The value range is 2-10.

Name.description: Name of the rule. When the `resource_type` is `net`, this field should be set with valid domain.

Protocol.description: Protocol of the rule, valid values are `http`, `https`. When `source_type` is 1(host source), the value of this field can only set with `tcp`.

ResourceId.description: ID of the resource that the layer 4 rule works for.

ResourceType.description: Type of the resource that the layer 4 rule works for, valid values are `bgpip` and `net`.

SPort.description: The source port of the L4 rule.

SessionSwitch.description: Indicate that the session will keep or not, and default value is `false`.

SessionTime.description: Session keep time, only valid when `session_switch` is true, the available value ranges from 1 to 300 and unit is second.

SourceType.description: Source type, 1 for source of host, 2 for source of ip.
